Group 3 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Task|5.0.0 to FHIR Extensions Pack

Source CodeRelationshipTarget CodeComment
Task.doNotPerform (doNotPerform)maps to wider concepthttp://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/request-doNotPerformNote that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `Task.doNotPerform`: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/request-doNotPerform`. Element `Task.doNotPerform` has a context of Task based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Task`.
Task.performer.actor (actor)maps to wider concepthttp://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-referenceElement `Task.performer.actor` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Task.performer` requires a cross-version extension. Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `Task.performer.actor` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `Task.performer.actor` has a context of Task based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Task`.
